name: RibbonChase
description: Paper airplane, wind, touch the sky, fly over the mountains and sea, behind is the stars.
minimum_requirements: OS: win7 Processor: intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD 290 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win10 Processor: intel i7 Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 Storage: 2 GB available space
